Articles.Content:
Here are some stock Thunderbirds I have made.

Includes all thunderbirds except for thunderbird 4 because it is a submarine.

ThunderBird 1- Easy enough to fly, not much ful though.

ThunderBird 2- Hardest thing in the world to fly. very little fuel, press 1 for atmospheric flight, press 2 for space flight, or just press space and watch the explosions.

ThunderBird 3- Extremely slow, and little fuel, though pretty easy to fly.

Thunderbird 5- Awesome. Takes a far bit to get into orbit, has about 600 parts, and looks really cool in my opinion. NOTE- TB5 does not come with a launch vehicle.

Most of these are for looks only, and i recommend using infinite fuel, no crash damage and stuff like that when flying these.

Spaceport Download;

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/stock-thunderbirds0-19/

Dropbox Mirror thingy;

https://www.dropbox.com/s/47we9tzt8z1fmhx/Stock%20ThunderBirds.zip

If you use these on youtube or other related things, please give me a mention.

Cheers, Fitzy.

Edited July 19, 2013 by Fitzy3

Here are some stock Thunderbirds I have made.

Includes all thunderbirds except for thunderbird 4 because it is a submarine.

ThunderBird 1- Easy enough to fly, not much ful though.

ThunderBird 2- Hardest thing in the world to fly. very little fuel, press 1 for atmospheric flight, press 2 for space flight, or just press space and watch the explosions.

ThunderBird 3- Extremely slow, and little fuel, though pretty easy to fly.

Thunderbird 5- Awesome. Takes a far bit to get into orbit, has about 600 parts, and looks really cool in my opinion. NOTE- TB5 does not come with a launch vehicle.

Most of these are for looks only, and i recommend using infinite fuel, no crash damage and stuff like that when flying these.

Heres a photo of TB 3 coming over to dock with TB 5.

http://i.imgur.com/rtP1JwD.jpg

Here is the download;

https://www.dropbox.com/s/47we9tzt8z1fmhx/Stock%20ThunderBirds.zip

If you use these on youtube or other related things, please give me a mention.

Cheers, Fitzy.

Very good! a little laggy on my machine but very faithful recreations.

I am attempting a TB-2 mod (not doing any of the others) I just love the TB2. Obviously the point of this is to accomplish it with stock parts, but if you just throw hydrotechs RCS plugin on, the TB2 will be alot friendlier to handle.

I built the jump ramp for it, that is working ok (until 0.20 and damned robotics died, I did release it at some point)

Very good! a little laggy on my machine but very faithful recreations.

I am attempting a TB-2 mod (not doing any of the others) I just love the TB2. Obviously the point of this is to accomplish it with stock parts, but if you just throw hydrotechs RCS plugin on, the TB2 will be alot friendlier to handle.

I built the jump ramp for it, that is working ok (until 0.20 and damned robotics died, I did release it at some point)

If you could do that it would be so cool. There is only 1 other thunderbird mod i think, and it is a untextured thunderbird 3 :|

Nice job!

Looks like we are going Thunderbirds nuts today!
